name: AddChangeRequestNote
description:
Add a note to a Freshservice change request.

Use this tool to create and add a note to an existing change request in Freshservice. Suitable for documenting updates or additional information related to a change request.

parameters.name: change_request_id
parameters.description: The ID of the change request for which you want to add the note.

value_schema.description: ID of change request for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the note to be created for the change request.

parameters.name: user_id_for_note_creator
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note on the change request.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: List of email addresses to notify about the note.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_body_html
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format to be added to the change request.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_content_plain_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format for the Freshservice change request.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_creation_datetime
parameters.description: The exact date and time when the note was created, in a string format (e.g., ISO 8601).

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was last updated. Format as a string, preferably in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: change_id
parameters.description: ID of change request for which notes are to be retrieved

value_schema.description: ID of change request for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
